name: Visions
text: At the start of a tactical action: You may return this card to the Dreaming Throne player to remove 1 nexus token from a system containing a planet you control.

name: Fragmentation
text: After 1 of your non-fighter ships in the active system is destroyed during combat against a player other than the Crystellum: Place 1 fighter from your reinforcements. Then, return this card to the Crystellum player.

name: From the Ashes
text: During a combat against a player other than the Ashen Legion player: When 1 of your units is destroyed during ground combat, place that unit immediately back into combat. Then, return this card to the Ashen Legion player.

name: Ejection
text: During a combat against a player other than the Iron Tide player: When one of your mechs is destroyed, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet. If you do, return this card to the Iron Tide player.

name: Advanced Structural Engineering
text: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control. This planet gains PRODUCTION X as if it were a unit, with X being the resource value of that planet.

name: Shared Network Access
text: At the start of the Net-Runners player's turn: You may place any combination of up to 2 fighters or infantry from your reinforcements in any system that contains one of your structures. Then, return this card to the Net-Runners player.
